message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with content recommendation, which is a common problem in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The use of adaptive clustering and exploration-exploitation strategies suggests a focus on reinforcement learning and online learning, which are subfields of machine learning. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also deals with data analysis and prediction, which suggests a focus on information retrieval (cs.IR) and data structures (cs.DS). Finally, the scalability properties and real-world experiments suggest a focus on systems and networking (cs.SI).
